title: Gamification-Based Instructional Design for Financial Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Pedagogical competency enhancement program for pre-service and in-service teachers. Strengthens educational application competencies through financial decision-making simulations. VR-based design integrating strategic game mechanics and debriefing sessions

learning_goals: Learners perform financial investment simulations with 85% or higher accuracy while applying risk management strategies
Learners connect in-game decision-making processes to three or more educational theories during debriefing sessions
Learners submit a project-based financial literacy education design plan at the individual/class level within two weeks

resources: Financial Simulation Game Software (Similar to Moonshot)
LMS System (Learning Material Distribution & Assignment Management)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
